text: Joe Pat Tolson (April 15, 1941 â€“ February 3, 2019) was an American Democratic politician. He was a member of the North Carolina House of Representatives from 1997 to 2014. Tolson was born in Pinetops, North Carolina. Tolson died on February 3, 2019 from respiratory failure at a hospital in Tarboro, North Carolina, aged 77. ==References== Category:1941 births Category:2019 deaths Category:Deaths from respiratory failure Category:State legislators of the United States Category:Politicians from North Carolina Category:Educators from North Carolina Category:Democratic Party (United States) politicians
title: Joe P. Tolson
